00030 #include <calvin_files/fusion-exp-data-writer/src/ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter.h>
00031 #include <calvin_files/utils/src/StringUtils.h>
00032 #include <calvin_files/converters/utils/src/CmdLine.h>
00033 #include <util/Convert.h>
00034 #include <file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h>
00035 
00036 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00037 {
00038         try
00039         {
00040                 CCmdLine cmdLine;
00041                 if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00042                         exit(-1);
00043 
00044                 std::string dataFileName = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-i", 0, "");
00045                 std::string celFileName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-cel", 0);
00046                 std::string chpFileName = celFileName.substr(0, celFileName.length() - 3) + "CHP";
00047                 std::wstring algname = L"SCAN-UPC";
00048                 std::wstring algversion = L"1.0";
00049                 std::wstring progname = L"EC";
00050                 std::wstring progversion = L"1.4";
00051                 std::wstring company = L"Affymetrix";
00052                 std::wstring arrayType = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(cmdLine.GetArgument("-a", 0));
00053                 ParameterNameValueTypeList algParams;
00054                 ParameterNameValueTypeList summaryParams;
00055                 std::list<std::string> psnames;
00056                 std::list<float> signals;
00057                 std::list<float> pvalues;
00058 
00059                 if (dataFileName.length() == 0)
00060                 {
00061                         for (int i=0; i<100; i++)
00062                         {
00063                                 psnames.push_back(ToStr(i));
00064                                 signals.push_back(i*10.0f);
00065                                 pvalues.push_back(i/10.0f);
00066                         }
00067                 }
00068                 else
00069                 {
00070                         std::string psname;
00071                         float sig;
00072                         float pval;
00073                         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00074                         tsv.bind(0, "probeset_id", &psname, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00075                         tsv.bind(0, "signal", &sig, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00076                         tsv.bind(0, "p-value", &pval, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00077                         if (tsv.open(dataFileName) != affx::TSV_OK)
00078                                 Err::errAbort("Can't open the input file");
00079 
00080                         tsv.headersBegin();
00081                         std::string key;
00082                         std::string val;
00083                         ParameterNameValueType param;
00084                         while (tsv.headersNext(key, val) == affx::TSV_OK)
00085                         {
00086                                 param.SetName(affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(key));
00087                                 param.SetValueText(affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(val));
00088                                 ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter::PrependAlgorithmParameterNameTag(param);
00089                                 algParams.push_back(param);
00090                         }
00091                         while (tsv.nextLine() == affx::TSV_OK)
00092                         {
00093                                 psnames.push_back(psname);
00094                                 signals.push_back(sig);
00095                                 pvalues.push_back(pval);
00096                         }
00097                         tsv.close();
00098                 }
00099                 
00100                 ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter writer;
00101                 writer.WhiteExpressionSignalDetectionCHPFile(celFileName, chpFileName, algname, algversion, progname, progversion, company, arrayType, algParams, summaryParams, psnames, signals, pvalues);
00102 
00103         }
00104         catch (std::exception& ex)
00105         {
00106                 std::cout << ex.what() << std::endl;
00107         }
00108         return 0;
00109 }
